original_text:
and its breaking is like that of a potter's vessel
    that is smashed so ruthlessly
that among its fragments not a shard is found
    with which to take fire from the hearth,
    or to dip up water out of the cistern.”
korean_text: 그가 이 나라를 무너뜨리시되 토기장이가 그릇을 깨뜨림 같이 아낌이 없이 부수시리니 그 조각 중에서, 아궁이에서 불을 붙이거나 물 웅덩이에서 물을 뜰 것도 얻지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: and its breaking is like that of a potter's vessel
that among its fragments not a shard is found
sentences.korean_translation: 그 조각들 중에서는 조각 하나도 발견되지 않고

sentences.original_text: with which to take fire from the hearth
or to dip up water out of the cistern
